annonstext:
Senior Data Engineer – Stockholm

You will be joining the Group Technology Organization team. We are a team of highly qualified engineers with strong industrial knowledge, supporting development of new platforms and services globally and across categories.

We offer you a key role in a company that is going through a digital transformation and moving towards a consumer-focused organization. We believe that smart appliances will further enable us to deliver great customer experience and we hope that you would like to join our journey.

We believe you have a passion for delivering remarkable consumer experiences to succeed in this role. You are comfortable in sharing your innovative ideas with your colleagues, as well as working in an international environment.

A REGULAR DAY AT WORK

As a Senior Data Engineer, you will work with design and development of how telemetry data generated in the appliance data is processed, stored and analysed in our backend system for connected appliances called Electrolux Connectivity Platform (ECP). 

Telemetry data is generated in our appliances (washing machines, tumble dryers, ovens, air conditioners, etc.) sent to the ECP where real time processing takes case, and eventually stored in our company-wide data lake for long term storage, historical analysis, etc.

ECP is based on micro services architecture and deployed on Kubernetes in cloud. The micro services are mostly created using Java but also NodeJs.

Your task will be among the following: 

• Design, develop and optimize data pipelines (hot, warm and cold data flows)

• Implement real-time streaming data processing 

• Support in the implementation of Machine Learning capabilities

• Analyze data quality, propose and implement improvements

The system is continuously being updated with new features and integrations. You will work with different stake holders to identify and plan requirements and be the lead data engineer within the team.

A key task will be to work with the appliance development team, the connectivity module team, the Global Data science team and the business stakeholders

You love working according to agile principles and have some experience in doing so. You are passionate about creating excellent consumer experiences and prefer that this drives the way the product is developed.

 

YOU

• International. You are used to a global environment with colleagues all over the world.

• Great listener and communicator. You will join a truly global team and work with other Electrolux offices around the world on a daily basis – therefore these attributes are key for making projects run smoothly.

• Proactive. You are keen for new experience, responsibility and accountability. You are self-driven, results-oriented with a positive outlook.

• Creative. Willing to keep technical background always up-to-date, commitment to technical excellence. 

• Teamwork oriented. In this role cross-functional collaboration is everything, so you should be comfortable in dealing with people with different backgrounds and responsibility, valuing and leading team work approach.

• Committed. You feel committed to constantly improve the system. You have a vision for its development for the future. You have a strong sense of ownership and you make sure it always runs smoothly

• Hands-on. You are not afraid to get your hands dirty. You have a strong programming background

EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE

• Master's Degree in Computer Science or Electronic Engineering, or related.

• Experienced and interested in data, stream data, big data, data governance, data models, data warehouse, data visualization

• At least 7 years of experience in the area of data engineering

• Strong coding skills preferably in Python, Scala, or Java

• Hands on experiences in the majority of the following: MongoDB, Postgres, Apache Kafka, Apache Spark, AWS Redshift, AWS Glue, Amazon Athena, Qlik Sense

• Systematic problem-solving approach with strong sense of ownership.

• Experience in IoT

• A great team player

• Fluency in English

Öppen för alla Vi fokuserar på din kompetens, inte dina övriga förutsättningar. Vi är öppna för att anpassa rollen eller arbetsplatsen efter dina behov.
